article_title: Ecuador’s Trade Surplus Soars on the Back of Oil Export Growth
article_text:
This copy is for your personal, non-commercial use only. To order presentation-ready copies for distribution to your colleagues, clients or customers visit http://www.djreprints.com.

twitter.description: Ecuador posted a trade surplus of $483 million for the January-May period from a deficit of $626 million one year before as exports grew 9% and imports fell 2%, the country's central bank said on Monday.
twitter.title: Ecuador’s Trade Surplus Soars on the Back of Oil Export Growth
